name: Love for a Stray
description:
As the last dog in Ashbrooke's Animal Shelter, you are set free to wander the streets and search for a place to call home.

LOVE FOR A STRAY is an adventure game focused on character and dialogue. It features one major storyline, a couple other characters you can interact with, and a somewhat real-time dialogue system where your choices are always one of barking, whimpering, growling, or staying silent.

Buttons to press: Arrow Keys, Z, X, C, Shift, and Space (K if you want to skip the intro)

NOTE: This game is a prototype and may contain bugs. Just let me know if you find anything weird/broken. Feedback is definitely appreciated! Also, if I've forgotten to credit you for art/sound, please let me know.

Chat with the dev @simplekoi

Learn about its development at LfaS Dev Blog

Some other projects

Known Issues:

  • Some dialogue text scrolling beyond textboxes
